org.GameLogic.Clock

Class GameClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.GameLogic.Clock.Clock
      • org.GameLogic.Clock.GameClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClockInterface

    public class GameClock
extends Clock
implements ClockInterface
    GameClock implements two countdowns, turnTime and visualizationTime.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameClock(Clockable clockable, long turnTime, long visualizationTime)
      Be sure you do not input totalTime or visualizationTime less than the fixed period time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Will destroy clock thread and will permit the clock from ticking.
      int getClockPeriod()
      Get clock ticking period.
      long getTime()
      Returns actual time of turn.
      long getTimeLeft()
      Returns left time of actual turn.
      long getTotalTime()
      Returns total time clock ticked.
      boolean isInTurnTime()
      Returns true if time is in turn time.
      void pauseTicking()
      Pause ticking.
      void resumeTicking()
      Resume ticking.
      void ticking()
      Is called when clock ticked.
      void timeElapsed()
      Is called when cycle time elapsed.
      void turnTimeOver()
      Clock will change state to visualization time.

      • Methods inherited from class org.GameLogic.Clock.Clock

        getCycle, getState, isPaused, isStarted, startTicking

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameClock

        public GameClock(Clockable clockable,
                 long turnTime,
                 long visualizationTime)
        Be sure you do not input totalTime or visualizationTime less than the fixed period time. If you do, totalTime and visualizationTime will be set to fixed period time (usually around 200ms).
        Parameters:
        clockable -
        turnTime - milliseconds
        visualizationTime - milliseconds
